name: Fasihi ya Kiswahili
description: Study Kiswahili literature, analysis, and critical thinking.
learningOutcomes: Analyze and interpret Kiswahili literary works
Develop critical thinking and analytical skills
Explore different genres and styles of Kiswahili literature
Enhance creative writing and expression in Kiswahili
recommendedFor: Students pursuing careers in Kiswahili literature and creative writing
prerequisites: Basic understanding of Kiswahili language and literature
